title: Lady Lydia's Beautiful Determination Betrayed, And Set On Breaking Off An Engagement
alternative_title: Koushaku Reijou Lydia no Utsukushiki Ken ; Koushaku Reijou Lydia no Utsukushiki Ken - Uragirareta no de Kochira kara Konyaku Hakisasete Itadakimasu ; Lady Lydia's Beautiful Determination Betrayed, and Set on Breaking Off an Engagement ; 侯爵令嬢リディアの美しき決断 ; 侯爵令嬢リディアの美しき決断～裏切られたのでこちらから婚約破棄させていただきます～
status: Koushaku Reijou Lydia no Utsukushiki Ken ; Koushaku Reijou Lydia no Utsukushiki Ken - Uragirareta no de Kochira kara Konyaku Hakisasete Itadakimasu ; Lady Lydia's Beautiful Determination Betrayed, and Set on Breaking Off an Engagement ; 侯爵令嬢リディアの美しき決断 ; 侯爵令嬢リディアの美しき決断～裏切られたのでこちらから婚約破棄させていただきます～
description:
Description :
        Story : Since she was just a child, Lydia was determined as the daughter of a Marquis to do everything in her power to support the royal family. However, everything seems to be changing before her very eyes as her fiance Rogerio begins showing romantic interest in a lowly noble aide to the princess. While ignoring their duties, the two seem to be getting awfully familiar... and yet Lydia seems to only be treated as an antagonist when confronting the situation. Feeling betrayed, her manners and patience have reached their limit...!
